name: Plugbot-enhanced
tagline: A simple and elegant auto-woot script for plug.dj
body:
## News

This script has been **obsolete** with the shutdown of plug.dj on Sep 28 2015.

# Plug.bot Enhanced

![snapshot](/images/snapshot-Plugbot-Enhanced.jpg "snapshot")

## Features

- Auto Woot
- Auto Join
- Media Link

## Install

### Bookmarklet

Drag the following link into the bookmarks bar:

- Minified version

Plug.bot Enhanced

## How to Use

Enter a [plug.dj](https://plug.dj/) room and click the bookmarklet.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
